guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.title: Available Services Are Secured
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that all the available services are secured when configuring your network switches.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
